RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awa rds).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG BANG BLUE set the pace, took command on the turn and from the three path through the stretch was much the best. ONLY BELIEVE tracked the early leaders from the outside and raced evenly on the turn but from the five path at the stretch was no match for the winner. LUNATICA was well back and trailed the field on the turn but from the seven path at the top of the stretch was up for show. MISS MOLLY LALOU settled off the pace and had a mild gain on the turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch was no real threat. HEAR ME KNOCKING stalked the early leader but lost ground on the turn and dropped back through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Molly Lalou
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, mild gain turn, 6-path stretch, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Hear Me Knocking
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, lost ground turn, dropped back stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Lunatica
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, trailed turn, 7-path stretch, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Only Believe
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside, evenly turn, 5-path stretch, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Big Bang Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, took command turn, 3-path stretch, much the best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 24600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Since July 22 Allowed 2 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired B reeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ACTION POINT was in touch, a factor on the turn and with a bid from the six path at the op of the stretch fought gamely for the win. RAGING BEAR stalked the early leader and had the lead on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was outgunned. GRAND GIZMO showed speed from the inside but was headed on the turn and held show. BIG BROWN BREWSKII was in range and roused on the turn but had no late kick. LE GRAND GARCON was off slow, showed little and was no factor. I'M NO SLEEPY JOE was well back and showed nothing in a dull effort.

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Gizmo
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, headed turn, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Action Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, factor turn, bid 6-p stretch, fought gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Le Grand Garcon
ENTRY.OWNER: Steer, Thomas R. and Walpole, Lance R.
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, showed little, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Raging Bear
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, led mid turn, 4-path stretch, outgunned

ENTRY.NAME: I'm No Sleepy Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, showed nothing, dull effort

ENTRY.NAME: Big Brown Brewskii
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, roused turn, no late kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 3 7F Turf CR: 81. Claiming Purse 15750. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,750, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(Limited To 10 Starters)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Six and One Half Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WENJACK stalked the early leader, was a factor on the far turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch proved best. WILLIAM BOY was in touch, roused from the inside on the far turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch was up for place. VETTORI KIN (BRZ) showed speed from the inside and had a clear lead on the far turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch failed to hold. DOCTOR UPTOWN was in range and raced evenly on the far turn but was no real threat. SAVVY'S SISTER was unhurried early and had a mild gain on the far turn but leveled off. BLOCKBUSTER was off the pace and saved ground on the far turn but had no impact. AM PREPARED was well back and showed little while outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Vettori Kin (BRZ)
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, clear lead far turn, 3-path stretch, failed to hold

ENTRY.NAME: Wenjack
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, factor far turn, 5-path stretch, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: William Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, roused inside far turn, 5-path stretch, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Am Prepared
ENTRY.OWNER: Roberto Joseph I and Cathcart Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, showed little, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Blockbuster
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground far turn, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Savvy's Sister
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, mild gain far turn, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Doctor Uptown
ENTRY.OWNER: Radcliffe Racing Stable and Admiral Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, evenly far turn, no real threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 4 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Claiming Purse 18900. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BROADWAY RUCKUS was away alertly and set the pace, had a clear lead on the far turn and was kept to task. BREACH OF TRUST tracked the early leader, was a factor on the far turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch was clearly second best. OPEECHEE was in tight on the clubhouse turn and had a mild gain on the far turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch had no kick. NGABE was in range and roused on the far turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch had no response. WIN THE DRAW was well back and hustled along on the far turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch was no threat. PRETZLICK was in touch early, trailed the field on the far turn, was outdistanced and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Broadway Ruckus
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, clear lead far turn, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Pretzlick
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch early, trailed far turn, outdistanced, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Ngabe
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, roused far turn, 4-path stretch, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Breach of Trust
ENTRY.OWNER: Lee Ken Mitchell Dennis Bell Donald K and Bell Gaye
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader, factor far turn, 4-path stretch, clearly 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Opeechee
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight 1st turn, mild gain far turn, 5-path stretch, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Win the Draw
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, hustled along far turn, 6-path stretch, no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 24600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Maiden Or Claiming Since July 22 Allowed 2 lbs. (*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHEBATOWN settled off the pace, moved up on the turn and from the seven path through the stretch was up in time. GIMBALA was in range and raced evenly on the turn but from the five path through the stretch was outgunned. GETTING AHEAD was away alertly, forced the pace on the turn and had the lead from the three path in mid stretch but gave way. J M R GEMMA was in mid pack and had a good position on the turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch was outfinished. FOREST B was in touch and a factor on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch evened out. LOVE MY CHERYL was unhurried early and hustled along on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch needed more. BILLYJANE set a pressured pace, had a slim lead on the turn and vied through the stretch but had nothing left. TRISH THE DISH was well back, showed little and was never in contention.

ENTRY.NAME: Billyjane
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, slim lead turn, vied stretch, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Shebatown
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, moved up turn, 7-path stretch, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Gimbala
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, evenly turn, 5-path stretch, outgunned

ENTRY.NAME: Getting Ahead
ENTRY.OWNER: Lippi Linda Irwin Wilfred M and Weingarten David
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, forced pace turn, led 3-path stretch, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: J M R Gemma
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, good position turn, 6-path stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Forest B
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, factor turn, 4-path stretch, evened out

ENTRY.NAME: Trish the Dish
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, showed little, never in contention

ENTRY.NAME: Love My Cheryl
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, hustled along turn, 3-path stretch, needed more

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 6 5F Turf CR: 78. Allowance Purse 24600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Since July 22 Allowed 2 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(Limited to 10 Starters)(*Plus Up To $4,725 Onta rio Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Five Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUSTIN'S WAY was unhurried early, moved up on the turn and with a bid in mid stretch proved best. VERY DEBONAIRE set the pace, had a slim lead on the turn and vied from the four path through the stretch but was second best. VOYANT was in touch and raced evenly on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch needed more. I LIVE BY FAITH was in range and in tight on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch was all out. M C JACKHAMMER was away alertly and forced the pace on the turn but had nothing left. BODIE settled off the pace and saved ground on the turn but had no rally. PRINCE FOR A DAY stalked the early leaders but chased on the turn and from the seven path at the top of the stretch had no impact. DON'T STOP DREAMIN was off the pace and roused on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch had no response. A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER ON M C JACKHAMMER AGAINST VERY DEBONAIRE FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE ON THE TURN WAS NOT ALLOWED.

ENTRY.NAME: Bodie
ENTRY.OWNER: Voyce Jeff and McGirr Jr Herbert
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, saved ground turn, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: M C Jackhammer
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, forced pace turn, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Voyant
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, evenly turn, 5-path stretch, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Prince for a Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leaders, chased turn, 7-path stretch, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: I Live by Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, in tight turn, 5-path stretch, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Justin's Way
ENTRY.OWNER: Leith Scott Zaniol Dean and Fournier Mark
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, moved up turn, bid stretch, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Stop Dreamin
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, roused turn, 4-path stretch, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Very Debonaire
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, slim lead turn, vied 4-path stretch, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 15750. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,750, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHELLY THE ROCKET was off slow, a factor on the turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch fought gamely for the win. IS THERE A FOREST set a pressured pace and had a slim lead on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch was outfinished. LOUEMMA was up close, had a good inside position on the turn and held show. SUBZERO PLUS was in range and hustled along on the turn but from the eight path at the top of the stretch had no late kick. SHANGHAI KIMMY was hustled early and forced the pace on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch faded. I'M A CUTIE was off slow and raced evenly on the turn but from the seven path at the top of the stretch weakened. WEST PAW was off slow and saved ground on the turn but was no threat. KOZY KAT was off the pace, showed little and was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Louemma
ENTRY.OWNER: Ascot Stud Willwerth James and Stocker-Parks Rachel
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, good inside position turn, held show

ENTRY.NAME: West Paw
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, saved ground turn, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Is There a Forest
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, slim lead turn, 3-path stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Kozy Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, showed little, not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Subzero Plus
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, hustled along turn, 8-path stretch, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: I'm a Cutie
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, evenly turn, 7-path stretch, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Shanghai Kimmy
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, forced pace turn, 5-path stretch, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Shelly the Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, factor turn, 6-path stretch, fought gamely
